19#include "PerspectiveTransform.h"
20#include "DetectorResult.h"
21
22namespace ZXing {
23
24/**
25* Samples an image for a rectangular matrix of bits of the given dimension. The sampling
26* transformation is determined by the coordinates of 4 points, in the original and transformed
27* image space.
28*
29* @param image image to sample
30* @param width width of {@link BitMatrix} to sample from image
31* @param height height of {@link BitMatrix} to sample from image
32* @param transform transforming a destination position into a source position
33* @return {@link DetectorResult} representing a grid of points sampled from the image within a region
34* defined by the "src" parameters. Result is empty if transformation is invalid (out of bound access).
35*/
36DetectorResult SampleGrid(const BitMatrix& image, int width, int height, const PerspectiveTransform& transform);
37
38} // ZXing
39
